div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 20 Peloponnesus, 1936 Burial: c. 460-450 B.C. (T) Contents: 9 AR. Elis: 7 st. (1 each as Seltman Grp. A, D; 2 as S. Grp. P; 3 as S. Grp. 5) 2 dr. (as S. pl. VIII,4 and another from same obv. die but fulmen rev.) Disposition: Ravel Letter from Ravel
